Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: For this purpose , bile salt pool composition , synthesis of individual BS in vivo , hepatic activities , and expression levels of cholesterol 7alpha - hydroxylase ( CYP7A ) , and sterol 27 - hydroxylase ( CYP27 ) , as well as of other enzymes involved in BS synthesis , were analyzed in rats treated with EE ( 5 mg / kg , 3 days ) or its vehicle .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| cholesterol 7alpha - hydroxylase (CYP7A) |
| sterol 27 - hydroxylase (CYP27) |

Note: These are not diseases but enzymes involved in bile salt synthesis.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

| --- |
| None |

The paragraph does not mention any diseases. The entities mentioned, "cholesterol 7alpha - hydroxylase (CYP7A)" and "sterol 27 - hydroxylase (CYP27)", are enzymes involved in bile salt synthesis and do not refer to diseases.
